alert.note: Alert for Clay (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 21 at 8:23PM CDT until April 29 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota...North Dakota... Red River of the North at Fargo affecting Cass and Clay Counties. Red River of the North at Wahpeton affecting Wilkin and Richland Counties. Red Lake River at Crookston affecting Polk County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota...North Dakota... Buffalo River near Dilworth affecting Clay County. Red River of the North at East Grand Forks affecting Polk and Grand Forks Counties. Red River of the North at Oslo affecting Walsh, Marshall, Polk and Grand Forks Counties. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING TO FRIDAY, APRIL 29... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Buffalo River near Dilworth. * WHEN...From Sunday evening to Friday, April 29. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Gage not accessible above 15 feet. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 9.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Sunday evening to a crest of 15.4 feet Tuesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
